clinical_study.brief_title: Russian Non-Interventional Study on Compliance of Venous Thromboembolism (VTE)
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Multicentre Non-interventional Study on Compliance and Patient/Doctor Behavior of VTE Prevention in Major Orthopedic Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: This is a local, prospective, multicenter, non-interventional, observational study. Primary objective is to describe how in "real life" thromboprophylaxis is carried out after the discharge from a hospital in the patients who undergo elective knee and hip replacement and who receive Xarelto during hospitalization.

primary_outcome.measure: Real life out-patient thromboprophylaxis after arthroplasty: Share of patients who follow physician's prescriptions; true duration of out-patient thromboprophylaxis; duration of treatment interruptions; in case of switching - reasons, drug regimen.

secondary_outcome.measure: Descriptive characteristics of prescription behaviour of orthopedists (VTE prevention recommended at discharge): continuation of rivaroxaban, switching to other products (name, dose, duration, efficacy control), mechanical prophylaxis, etc.
Adverse event characteristics (frequency, severity, relation to VTE prevention treatment, AE treatment, AE outcome)

intervention.description: The patients will be treated according to the routine practice. All the patients meeting the criteria of inclusion and exclusion to whom administration of Xarelto is indicated are fit for participation in this non-interventional study.

study_pop.textblock: The patients will be treated according to the routine practice. All the patients meeting the criteria of inclusion and exclusion to whom administration of Xarelto is indicated are fit for participation in this non-interventional study.

Exclusion Criteria:
